SQL_VIEW: SELECT <RULE_ID>,CAT."creator" AS SCHEMA_NAME,T."table_name" AS TABLE_NAME,C."column_name" AS COLUMN_NAME FROM "sap.tm.trp.db.archive::<RDS_NAME>_systable" T INNER JOIN "sap.tm.trp.db.archive::<RDS_NAME>_systabcol" C ON T."table_id" = C."table_id" INNER JOIN "sap.tm.trp.db.archive::<RDS_NAME>_syscatalog"  CAT ON T."table_name" = CAT."tname" INNER JOIN "sap.tm.trp.db.archive::<RDS_NAME>_sysuser"  USR ON  T."creator"=USR."user_id"  WHERE T."table_name"=':SDA_TABLE_NAME' AND LOWER(CAT."creator")=(SELECT LOWER(VALUE) FROM "sap.tm.trp.db.archive::t_archive_configuration" WHERE KEY='SCHEMA_NAME') AND LOWER(USR."user_name")=(SELECT LOWER(VALUE) FROM "sap.tm.trp.db.archive::t_archive_configuration" WHERE KEY='SCHEMA_NAME')

SELECT <RULE_ID>,CAT."creator" AS SCHEMA_NAME,T."table_name" AS TABLE_NAME,C."column_name" AS COLUMN_NAME FROM "sap.tm.trp.db.archive::<RDS_NAME>_systable" T INNER JOIN "sap.tm.trp.db.archive::<RDS_NAME>_systabcol" C ON T."table_id" = C."table_id" INNER JOIN "sap.tm.trp.db.archive::<RDS_NAME>_syscatalog"  CAT ON T."table_name" = CAT."tname" INNER JOIN "sap.tm.trp.db.archive::<RDS_NAME>_sysuser"  USR ON  T."creator"=USR."user_id"  WHERE T."table_name"=':SDA_TABLE_NAME' AND LOWER(CAT."creator")=(SELECT LOWER(VALUE) FROM "sap.tm.trp.db.archive::t_archive_configuration" WHERE KEY='SCHEMA_NAME') AND LOWER(USR."user_name")=(SELECT LOWER(VALUE) FROM "sap.tm.trp.db.archive::t_archive_configuration" WHERE KEY='SCHEMA_NAME')
